item.create_arcanus.spectral_goggles.too: Augments your HUD with _miscellaneous information_ about placed components. May also include some _Side Effects_
Imbues your vision with _Arcane Sight_. Creatures all around you glow with their _Aura_.

_Kinetic components_ show added _Stress Impact_ or _Capacity_. _Stressometers_ show statistics of their _attached kinetic network_. Some other blocks reveal information such as item and fluid content.
